title: Harrowing Katarina Low/No sound on dagger pickups [Gameplay Bug]
body: I don't know if it's just me but, I can barely/ can't hear when you pickup katarina's daggers on the new skin for her Harrowing. Not only that but it seems like everything else about the skin is really quiet compared to other skins on her.

replies.body:
Hi hi! We'll have a fix for this in 7.22.

{{sticker:katarina-love}}
Yeah, the harrowing katarina skin has practically no sound for any of her spells. Most noticeable on her ult.
